values.help: You may select the dim level whenever the light is turned back ON to be either full brightness (100% dim level) or be the same as the last dim setting when the light is ON by flicking the wall switch
values.label: Dim level when light is turned ON

values.help:
You may change the dimming step level when you adjust the brightness by your controller/gateway.
	  When the value is low, dimming/brightening is gradual.
	  When the value is high, dimming/brightening is rapid.
values.label: Dimming/Brightening Step Level

values.help:
You may change the dimming speed quicker or slower.
	  When the value is low, the step timing is quick.
	  When the value is high, the step timing is slow.
values.label: Dimming/Brightening Step Timing
